learning settings.mtl comment: mtl learning control whether to use multi-task learning or a single task learning
learning settings.ch learning comment: ch learning refers to Counter-Hebbian learning instead of back-propagation
learning settings.shared weights comment: whether the TD network use the BU weights or its own unique weights
learning settings.non linear function comment: not working yet, this parameter does not have any effect yet
learning settings.back bias comment: a bias for the TD network
learning settings.resume training comment: true if keep training is desired. false for evaluating a pre-trained model without training.

data set parameters.comment: parameters for creating a data set, if data path is provided, the data set will be loaded
